```
var matrixBytes: Int { get }
```

## [See Also](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrix/matrixbytes#see-also)

### [Properties](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrix/matrixbytes#Properties)

[`var device: any MTLDevice`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrix/device)The device on which the matrix will be used.[`var rows: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrix/rows)The number of rows in the matrix.[`var columns: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrix/columns)The number of columns in the matrix.[`var dataType: MPSDataType`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrix/datatype)The type of the values in the matrix.[`var rowBytes: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrix/rowbytes)The stride, in bytes, between corresponding elements of consecutive rows in the matrix.[`var data: any MTLBuffer`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrix/data)The buffer that stores the matrix data.[`var matrices: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpsmatrix/matrices)
